name: Drag n Shoot
description:
Reach the goal by stroking the ball.

Controls

Mouse only - click to start aiming, release to shoot. 

Aiming modes

There are two aiming modes 

  • stick to ball - makes the ball an origin of the aiming - takes its world position as the camera is zooming out during the aiming
  • free aim - takes the clicked position as the origin 

TIP - shot can be canceled - when the distance is very small it will drop to 0 and don't count the shot

PC only

Aiming can be canceled by the ESC key, it can also open settings.

R - restart level, otherwise in Settings

Made by Jiří Filek
